name: CLError.Code
desc: Error codes returned by the location manager object.

items.name: case locationUnknown
items.desc: A constant that indicates the location manager was unable to obtain a location value right now.

items.name: case denied
items.desc: A constant that indicates the user denied access to the location service.

items.name: case promptDeclined
items.desc: A constant that indicates the user didn’t grant the requested temporary authorization.

items.name: case network
items.desc: A constant that indicates the network was unavailable or a network error occurred.

items.name: case headingFailure
items.desc: A constant that indicates the location manager can’t determine the heading.

items.name: case rangingUnavailable
items.desc: A constant that indicates ranging is disabled.

items.name: case rangingFailure
items.desc: A constant that indicates a general ranging error occurred.

items.name: case regionMonitoringDenied
items.desc: A constant that indicates the user denied access to the region monitoring service.

items.name: case regionMonitoringFailure
items.desc: A constant that indicates the location manager failed to monitor a registered region.

items.name: case regionMonitoringSetupDelayed
items.desc: A constant that indicates Core Location failed to initialize the region monitoring feature.

items.name: case regionMonitoringResponseDelayed
items.desc: A constant that indicates Core Location will deliver events but they may be delayed.

items.name: case geocodeCanceled
items.desc: A constant that indicates the geocode request was canceled.

items.name: case geocodeFoundNoResult
items.desc: A constant that indicates the geocode request yielded no result.

items.name: case geocodeFoundPartialResult
items.desc: A constant that indicates the geocode request yielded a partial result.

items.name: case deferredFailed
items.desc: A constant that indicates the location manager didn’t enter deferred mode for an unknown reason.

items.name: case deferredCanceled
items.desc: A constant that indicates your app or the location manager canceled the request for deferred updates.

items.name: case deferredAccuracyTooLow
items.desc: A constant that indicates deferred mode isn’t supported for the requested accuracy.

items.name: case deferredDistanceFiltered
items.desc: A constant that indicates deferred mode doesn’t support distance filters.

items.name: case deferredNotUpdatingLocation
items.desc: A constant that indicates the location manager didn’t enter deferred mode because location updates were already disabled or paused.
